availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lewis Walker Lewis (Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mahala A. Simones Lewis in Franklin County, Kentucky, on November 25, 1852. Father of Fielding E. Lewis, Francis A. Lewis, Lewellen "Lindon" Lewis, and Hugh Lewis. Farmer in Franklin County in 1850. Farmer in Franklin County in 1860. Farmer in Franklin County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 94B. .
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 352.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Bald Knob, p. 1A.
Consolidated List of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Franklin County, KY, July 1863, p. 8.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994034, Franklin County Marriages.
"Deaths," _The Frankfort Roundabout _ (Frankfort, KY), September 15, 1900, p. 3.
